content: this cute spider in a web crochet lovey pattern is a fast and fun crochet project the perfect make for your next baby gifting occasion or keep it for yourself i totally won t tell this adorable pattern includes written instructions and photos it is an advanced beginner/intermediate level crochet pattern written in english using standard american terms note this is a listing for a downloadable pdf pattern to crochet your own spider in a web crochet lovey > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog > here 1 the benefit of purchasing > this pdf is an easy to read > printable and ad-free version of the > pattern size lovey shown measures about 13 when folded blanket is approximately 21 across at widest point materials needed - worsted weight yarn - crochet hook size h - optional safety eyes embroider eyes for small children instead - fiberfill - tapestry needle pattern will be available for instant download upon payment the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/crochet-baby-lovey/
